last_episode_to_air.name: Closing Knight
last_episode_to_air.overview: The squads fight against each other in one final battle, with the top group becoming Knights of Astoria forever!

name: Knight Squad
overview: Two mismatched students at a magical school for knights in training form an unlikely alliance to protect each other’s secret and pursue their dreams.

episodes.name: Opening Knight
episodes.overview: A rambunctious princess and a mischievous drifter discover a shared secret… they created new identities to attend knight school. They become unlikely partners and band together to achieve their dream of becoming legendary knights.

episodes.name: A Knight at the Roxbury
episodes.overview: Ciara's competitiveness gets the best of her when she puts winning a prestigious school tournament ahead of her new friendship with Arc.

episodes.name: Knight in Shining Armor Day
episodes.overview: When the Phoenix Squad is chosen to host the annual Armor Day feast, Arc must rely on Ciara to help him with the festive traditions, and to protect his secret.

episodes.name: One Magical Knight
episodes.overview: Arc discovers that Warwick can cast magic spells, but things get out of hand when he starts using his secret talent.

episodes.name: The Dork Knight Returns
episodes.overview: Arc's predecessor on the Phoenix Squad returns, bumping Arc to the Kraken Squad while his friends secretly work to get rid of their former partner.

episodes.name: Tonight, Two Knight
episodes.overview: On the eve of Ciara's sister's return from the battlefield, Sir Gareth binds the feuding Arc and Ciara with "magical friendship bracelets" from which they can only be released by demonstrating sincere kindness toward each other.

episodes.name: A Knight's Tail
episodes.overview: Ciara entrusts Arc with her Pixie Ring, which turns him into a hideous beast when he tests the ring's powers on himself; desperate to undo the curse, Ciara and Arc seek the help of the Pixie Queen, who reveals she has beef with Arc.

episodes.name: Parent Teacher Knight
episodes.overview: The Phoenix Squad appeals to Sir Gareth in an effort to expel Sage from Knight School, but his meeting with Sage's mother backfires after he falls in love at first sight, and follows her command to immediately make Sage a knight.

episodes.name: Do the Knight Thing
episodes.overview: Sorcery School students temporarily move onto the Knight School grounds, and quickly engage in a competition for control of the Phoenix squad room; Arc and Ciara must decide how far they will go to win and save their school.

episodes.name: Wish I May, Wish I Knight
episodes.overview: When Arc gives Ciara a bottle with a genie inside, she decides to make a wish so that she can attend Knight School. But, when Sage becomes princess and gets the bottle so that the genie, Kiki, is hers, Arc and Ciara have to get it back.

episodes.name: Working on the Knight Moves
episodes.overview: When each squad in knight school has to make a signature move to impress Sir Swayze and pass a test, Phoenix Squad has their moves under control. But when Sage steals their idea, the squad must stop them from doing it or come up with a new move before the presentation.

episodes.name: Take Me Home to Knight
episodes.overview: Arc's swindler father wants his son to leave Knight School and help with his latest con; to prove he's destined for knighthood instead, Arc stands up for himself, but soon becomes stuck in one of his father's shady schemes.

episodes.name: A Total Knightmare
episodes.overview: Knight School quests have begun and Warwick worries his fears will hinder the squad

episodes.name: Fight for Your Knight to Party
episodes.overview: Ciara wants to bake the King his traditional birthday cake, but she and the Phoenix Squad need the help of an old enemy who is cooking up his own plans for revenge.

episodes.name: Fright Knight
episodes.overview: After the Princess defies her father's orders and attends the Party of Darkness, the Shadow Ghost appears and threatens to possess her, forcing the Phoenix Squad to fight to save their friend.

episodes.name: Little Knight Lies
episodes.overview: Worried that her royal duties are taking her away from Prudy, Ciara arranges for Prudy to become friends with the princess; when Prudy starts spending too much time with the princess, Ciara becomes jealous of her alter ego.

episodes.name: End of the Knight Part 1
episodes.overview: An injured Princess Eliza informs the kingdom that evil Ryker is near the all-powerful Armor of Astoria; Arc and Ciara race to its location, but a shocking betrayal allows Ryker to take the armor and reclaim Astoria's throne.

episodes.name: End of the Knight, Part 2
episodes.overview: When an injured Princess Eliza informs the kingdom that Ryker is near the all-powerful Armor of Astoria, Arc and Ciara race to its location, but a shocking betrayal allows Ryker to take the Armor and reclaim Astoria's throne.

episodes.name: A Knight to Remember
episodes.overview: When big-mouthed Prudence learns of Arc and Ciara's secrets, she agrees to have her memory wiped before accidentally exposing her friends to the entire kingdom, then forgets they were ever her friends at all.

episodes.name: Mid-Knight in the Garden of Good and Evil
In the Gill of the Knight
episodes.overview: Arc's secret is threatened when Sir Gareth confiscates Prudence's magic mirror containing a picture of him that will prove he is not a true Dragonblood.

episodes.name: Two Wrongs Don't Make a Knight
episodes.overview: When the Phoenix Squad suspects Sage is cheating, Ciara uses the Princess to recruit her as a guard and keep her from training for the upcoming whip battle.

episodes.name: Election Knight
episodes.overview: Prudence’s quirky ideas while running for Class Ruler has her friends in the Phoenix Squad worried that she will embarrass herself, so they secretly take over the campaign.

episodes.name: Closing Knight
episodes.overview: The squads fight against each other in one final battle, with the top group becoming Knights of Astoria forever!
